Isabella Rodriguez.description: hosting the lunch Potluck, encouraging everyone to bring a dish and reminding them to avoid non-vegan items (inviting customers to join the lunch Potluck) @ the Ville:Hobbs Cafe:cafe:cafe customer seating

Maria Lopez.description: studying at Hobbs Cafe (conversing about Klaus Mueller and Maria Lopez are discussing gathering more sources for Klaus's paper on gentrification, meeting at Hobbs Cafe to grab coffee, and planning to discuss the social implications of gentrification, potential solutions to mitigate its negative impact on low-income communities, and how to incorporate community input in urban planning.) @ the Ville:Hobbs Cafe:cafe:cafe customer seating
